pr_title: Rename spi providers to match {$PACKAGE}Provider name

timeline.message:
Rename spi providers to match {}Provider name

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Cristian Drutu <bogdandrutu@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: How about TracerProvider, since this provides tracers, not traces?
timeline.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: I was thinking to use the name of the package with the idea that it provides the implementation of the whole package. Maybe we rename the whole package to traces (separate PR maybe)?
replies.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText:
how about "tracing", then? And, yes, a follow-up PR would be fine.
So, we have the package io.opentelemetry.tracing... and TracingProvider.  I like that much more.
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText:
If we happen to rename things, I'd be up for tracing rather than traces (even though we have metrics, as in a plural noun ;) )
That being said, having this as either TracerProvider or TraceProvider is fine IHMO.
replies.author: carlosalberto
